TopicTitle: [11/26/15 Update] Say Hello to the Light-Green Group!

Articles.Content: Note: I'm listed as being in 23rd place, but if you check the numbers, you will see that it's just that the list is out of date.
thoose green card xdr :3

Look ma' I made it!

Three light green bars is enough to be proud of!

*knock knock*

Hello !

*knock knock*

Hello !

JELLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLO! Now its a party!

JELLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLO! Now its a party!

Now, I'm no Light-greener (yet!), but I think it's a little impolite to eat the new members, don't you?

2002 Points.

That means that my reputation cannot be measured... except that I have 2002 points. Wait, what?

Edited November 12, 2015 by Mad Rocket Scientist

That means that my reputation cannot be measured... except that I have 2002 points. Wait, what?

Our reputations have such gravity that relativistic effects become important. Thus our reputations cannot truly be measured; they can only be estimated.

This thread is too great...

Also my rep has risen since the last OP update! No rush though.
Eyyyyy, I made the Fabled Light Green List! I'm finally Internet FamousÃ¢â€žÂ¢!

[SIZE=1]*awkwardly rubs neck*[/SIZE]

[I]Apparently[/I], these things don't hold up so good on fire. :huh:

[img]http://i.imgur.com/yONLrvH.png[/img]

*awkwardly i don't have one of thoose and never will* gnagnagna ,'')

[SIZE=1]btw @ mad whenever i fix some irl stuff i sink i could may be maintain the white list for fun i ll pm you whenever i m sure i can do that long run ,'')[/SIZE] Edited November 16, 2015 by WinkAllKerb''
Yay, equal light and dark bars. Must say that I don't pay attention to rep like I used to, so this one kind of snuck up on me. :)

[quote name='Dman979']Now, I'm no Light-greener (yet!), but I think it's a little impolite to eat the new members, don't you? :sticktongue:[/QUOTE]


Now you are!

Kongrachuleyschuns!

[quote name='Columbia']Now you are!

Kongrachuleyschuns![/QUOTE]

Hey, that's right! I'm just waiting for my card to come in the mail.

Congrats, Dman!

It's well deserved. Now if only we can get Endersmens to update the OP. :)

Happy landings!

With the new forum software, will the concept of "light green bars" still exist? Or will the "Rep-O-Meter" be replaced by something else...? Only time will tell, but I'm predicting that the concept of "light green bars" wlll go away.

R.I.P Light Green group. You will be remembered as a remanant of an older era.

:hailprobe:. they\'re. April 2013.

And now... Edited November 23, 2015 by Norpo

I'll do my best to get the final update out. If anyone would like to speed the process, the only thing limiting it is the descriptions. If anyone wants to step up and write some descriptions for users, please PM me. I would like to see the final update include all descriptions. If we lose the "light green group" to the new software, I want it to be fully remembered.

Anyone wanna help? :)
The LGG will no longer, exist just a little green dot with a number next to it.

[quote name='DuoDex']The LGG will no longer, exist just a little green dot with a number next to it.[/QUOTE]

Which means I need your guys' help! This is a call to action. :D
You can still have the LGG, the name just won't have the same meaning. The values however should remain across to the new forum software (which you already have in the OP).

[quote name='Alshain']You can still have the LGG, the name just won't have the same meaning. The values however should remain across to the new forum software (which you already have in the OP).[/QUOTE]

This is true. We might need a new name then. Any suggestions?

[quote name='Endersmens']This is true. We might need a new name then. Any suggestions?[/QUOTE]
500+ Group?

[quote name='Mad Rocket Scientist']500+ Group?[/QUOTE]
Kinda...bland. Although it might have to do. Any other suggestions?

Should we keep the number at 500 though? The list is getting huge. It could be better to up the lower limit. Although that wouldn't really be all that fair either. Gah. Decisions suck. :P

[quote name='Endersmens']Kinda...bland. Although it might have to do. Any other suggestions?

Should we keep the number at 500 though? The list is getting huge. It could be better to up the lower limit. Although that wouldn't really be all that fair either. Gah. Decisions suck. :P[/QUOTE]
>.999K? I know, it's even worse.
